pageSetting.title: 存贷款业绩分配日志

attribute.value: select dmz as key ,dmms as value from pas.csb_dmms where dmmc = 'KHZHLX' and dmz in ('ck','dk')

select.isEqual: select f_timetochar(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, czy.hymc as czymc, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz, czlxms.dmms as czlx, zh.zhdh as zh, zh.khh, zh.zhhm as khmc, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.clbl, gxjl.clje yz, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq from pas.xtb_zhgxrz_$dxlx$ gxrz inner join pas.xtb_zhgxjl_$dxlx$ gxjl on gxjl.jldh = gxrz.jldh inner join pas.jxdx_$dxlx$zh zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.zhdh like '%$zhdh$%' inner join pas.khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join pas.csb_dmms czlxms on czlxms.dmmc='RZCZLX' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and gxrz.xgrdh = $khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between f_inttotime($qsrq$,1) and f_inttotime($jsrq$,2) order by gxrz.jlsj desc, zh.zhdh asc, gxjl.jldh asc, gxjl.ggbz asc

select f_timetochar(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, czy.hymc as czymc, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz, czlxms.dmms as czlx, zh.zhdh as zh, zh.khh, zh.zhhm as khmc, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.clbl, gxjl.clje yz, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq from pas.xtb_zhgxrz_$dxlx$ gxrz inner join pas.xtb_zhgxjl_$dxlx$ gxjl on gxjl.jldh = gxrz.jldh inner join pas.jxdx_$dxlx$zh zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.zhdh like '%$zhdh$%' inner join pas.khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join pas.csb_dmms czlxms on czlxms.dmmc='RZCZLX' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and gxjl.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between f_inttotime($qsrq$,1) and f_inttotime($jsrq$,2) order by gxrz.jlsj desc, zh.zhdh asc, gxjl.jldh asc, gxjl.ggbz asc

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key ,dmms as value from pas.csb_dmms where dmmc = 'KHZHLX' and dmz in ('ck','dk')
